XIIII.

To Maximus are addressed iii. 23 vi. 11. 34; vii. 26 ; viii. 19. 243 ix. l. 23. There are a number of Maximi mentioned by Pliny, an Anicius Maximus, proconsul of Bithynia, (x. 112), a L. Norbanus Maximus, also apparently proconsul of Bithynia under Domitian, (x. 58), a Laberius Maximus, and others. To which of these this letter is addressed we cannot determine.
